channel.title: Tops on Innercoder.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Innercoder.dev

item.description: My name is Jaime Arrocha, I am an expericenced macOs and Linux system developer with interest in embedded systems, IoT, RTOS, computer networking and cloud computing. I created this website with the intent of both learning and giving back to the community. I hope that the information you find here is of help. I will try my best to keep the website alive with interesting posts. There’s a chinese saying that goes “Don’t be fearful of a slow progress, be fearful of a standstill”.

Courses on Embedded Systems, Robotics, and Controls Here are some courses that I have taken and found to be really good. They are either free or low cost. They all vary in skills from software development, embedded systems, and control systems. Space Dynamics and Control Coursera Space Dynamics and Control Autonomous Navigation for Flying Robots Coursera Autonomous Navigation for Flying Robots Robotics Specialization Coursera Robotics Specialization Modern Robotics Specialization Coursera Modern Robotics Specialization
